document_data.name: Barbecue
document_data.location:
[[Dalelands]], [[Interior Faerûn]]
[[Zhentil Keep]], [[Moonsea]]
[[Neverwinter]], [[Sword Coast North]]
[[Ravens Bluff]], [[The Vast]]{{Cite polyhedron/79/The Living City: The Painted Boat Restaurant|15}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Barbecue''' was a type of fire-roasted smoky and tangy food consumed in the [[Northwest Faerûn]], [[North Faerûn]], and [[The Vast]].
document_data.Description: Spit-roast barbecue was a type of food prepared by the [[Zhentarim]]-allied [[fire giant]] who inhabited the [[Flaming Tower]] outpost in the [[Dalelands]]. They cooked animals whole, slowly rotating the carcasses over barbecue pits.
document_data.Availability:
[[Pork]] and [[chicken]] barbecue was served at the [[Painted Boat Restaurant]] in the city of [[Ravens Bluff]].

Barbecued meat was a common dish in the city of [[Neverwinter]] during the annual [[Lliira's Night]] and [[Midsummer]] festivals.
